articles.title: Putin is attempting to destabilise European countries to divert attention from Ukraine, warns Kosovo's president - Sky News
articles.content:

articles.title: Western pleas over Ukraine fail to sway global south - Financial Times

articles.content: Western leaders used a gathering of global elites in Munich to make the case that Russias invasion of Ukraine posed a threat not just to Europe but to the whole world. There was little evidence their… [+5427 chars]
